Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment

official_title: To provide for standards for the cleanup of domestic nuclear energy industry facilities and other radiologically contaminated sites.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to promulgate standards to protect public health, safety, and the environment from the hazards of radiologically contaminated sites. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To provide for standards for the cleanup of domestic nuclear energy industry facilities and other radiologically contaminated sites.
